where need_vrsn_nbr = #{needVrsnNbr,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and expt_seq_nbr = #{exptSeqNbr,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and data_src_abbr = #{dataSrcAbbr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select:
select
from data_interface_records where 1=1 and data_src_abbr = #{dataSrcAbbr,jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by expt_date desc
select * from data_interface_records_detail where 1=1 and data_src_abbr = #{dataSrcAbbr,jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by expt_seq_nbr desc
